review_details: We did this fishing tour in July. Everything was great. Comfortable transportation from our hotel to the port, amazing fishing experience, fun snorkeling, so delicious and quite unique seafood dish, very kind and experienced captain and beautiful sunset..... Moreover, it was very private.(So, I felt that we were totally 'safe' during this tour in this tough times. )It was the best experience in Santorini. I strongly recommend this tour.
reviewFor: santorini sunset fishing tour small group with dinner drinks & transportation
